title: Show your Season 7 ranked stats
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/060b2fade66ee04e4c16288fc13140d7.png
https://i.gyazo.com/527f47c3ba3a9b09d7848a96350535a4.png

Most of you already know that I almost only play Taliyah.
Now I want to know what the other people on the boards play in ranked and how they do.

This is a place to show off your stats that you're proud of and stats that you're ashamed of.
It doesn't matter, post them all. Bragging is allowed so don't hesitade to say how proud of yourself you are.

I used lolalytics for this.
http://euw.lolalytics.com/summoner/taliyahtomaster 
You're free to use any other website if it looks good enough to look at.

Just share the stats and / or maybe write a comment about a stat that looks weird to you.

That one Ezreal game I played was Ezreal support hence the 7/17/15 don't do this in ranked. I'm actually not sure why I did it and funny enough I don't remember it too well.

######Posted it in Memes and Games yesterday but it was taken down due to wrong forum, so here is another try.

replies.body:
there is only one thing i'm proud of

https://i.gyazo.com/d73ede03f7d815c69c95b33ce12c0057.png
unfortunatly my win rate decreased once i hit master :(

i prefer my stats in season 3, used to be a pure toplaner main

Thresh triple kill
I've seen enough.

I already miss the old client

they said new client will have this too, it's just incomplete

one thing i'm attached to is my stats from season 1 to now that carries my experience
i leggit mained almost anyone
I wish I would have played back then. I only ever heard funny stories and saw some videos about 6 sunfire cape evelynn and stuff.

stuff like 6 sunfire cape eve was way older than me
the only crazy stuff i could witness was dodge master jax (around 50%) that was played bot lane as a hyper carry, and global teleportation TF that was permabanned as if he hits 6 he instantly tp bot to gank
everything else was just banal stat-checking like old morde, old gp ect...
> [{quoted}](name=TaliyahToMaster,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2jirxJxY,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-27T23:46:29.226+0000)
>
> I wish I would have played back then.


meh... what i wish is that i had the skill i have now, i was bronze in season 1 with 800 elo which means i was nearly bronze 4

https://gyazo.com/0db249190dd50cc8414685d761c5c881 When I first got placed in bronze I was tempted to get out easily by playing meta. I recently stopped that I found a champion I'm good at and enjoy therefore only one champion that has a good sample size and a good winrate.

Ps: I know I'm bad so before anyone wants to call it out I don't care

It doesn't matter if you're bronze, gold or diamond. What counts is that you're happy with what you accomplished so far and that you improve if you want to.

With that renekton you should be able to climb a bit higher if you want to. 
Just need to try to die less on support champions. It's often better to run away letting a teammate die than going back trying to safe them and end up dying too. 
Overall looks good to me.

Thanks for the kind words I only did Thresh for placements however because at the time I loved him (Ps if your wondering about the missing Jhin games I kinda wanna wait till adcs are viable again before I go back)

Why not.


https://i.imgur.com/xpruxlx.png

I thought you play more rankeds, but figured your top played champ would be gp^^

Didn't know about Sion tho.
Support or Top sion?

I'm planning to get to diamond in Summer, but for now I'm just focussing on making it to the next year of muh education :^)

Top Sion, primarily, but when I'm autofilled I usually just play him aswell ^^

Good luck with that.
Real life has priority, but with how close you are to diamond already, it should not be too hard for you to get in.

Aye, I've gotten to play against A lot of low diamond players already because of MM and Rubick inflating my normal MMR :P
Sometimes even high Diamond or masters player.

Considering I can usually perform pretty consistant in those games, I'm pretty confident D5 shouldn't be too hard :P

Seems like the downvote police is here.
Did I hurt anyones feelings? Sorry about that lol.
Looks like you have some haters now lol
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6-sYTAHtzXM
pls no

BEHOLD!
The only acceptable stats for a filthy OTP like myself!

https://www2.pic-upload.de/img/33248362/Bildschirmfoto2017-05-29um15.43.50.png

https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Chimpleton

Not too disappointed by my climb so far, I don't play that much, so coming from B4, I ain't mad.
Pretty solid corki and katarina stats. You should play them more often.
Ranked: a fantastic way to gauge whose pugs were worse.

heres my shit

http://na.lolalytics.com/summoner/warpenguin555
https://i.gyazo.com/51fc762cb48487f3dda7e2f76fbb0773.png  used to maing adc, now I main top/jg cuz I like it better
your winrates in top/jg are definitely better than your adc's. Not bad. How long did it take you to adapt to the new roles? You played alot of adc's games before after all

Not very long actually I just don't play well on adc in lane, but with riven I do good mostly every game and with graves I kinda rely on my team to not feed pre 10 mins and if they don't we win.  Riven and graves are also super strong rn so that helps
3 games into my 3v3 provisionals with 100% win rate on kindred and vlad, i will finish them eventually

http://i.imgur.com/CCpidDv.png?noredirect

The stats are from my own website, [Pentasteal.lol](http://pentasteal.lol/player/na/drcyanide/#champions), which lets me do some cool things. For example, I can set up filters to see my win rates with and against certain champions (for example, I currently have a 40% win rate against Yasuo, but a 80% win rate with him on my team).

FYI The "Lanes Played" is a based on how Riot says you played, and isn't 100% accurate. I never *actually* played Jungle Xerath, I just had some games where I roamed a lot early.

very nice Xerath stats.

The website itself is not bad tbh. Just doesn't seem to properly work for me.
https://i.gyazo.com/3186fbc6125bc212b9b09955a22dca9b.png
https://i.gyazo.com/470cbd6c4ed077ac369619aa4a5c8982.png
Press "Update Details", then it'll work. I broke the error messages a little while ago, my bad.

https://i.gyazo.com/1fb3daa4b89c6e839f300f76fab1917c.png 
tfw u wanna abuse Kassadin Vlad and Syndra before her nerf but lose every game because team ints kappa

That's a fizz OTP.
Nice stats and even one penta not bad.

Looks like you play alot of assassins. Not my favorite class tbh^^

Yeah but after the Fizz nerf.. https://i.gyazo.com/7c90c511687bf79cc5b9bf235bcae3d8.png Im dead inside feelsbadman

I hate being immobile like Taliyah.. and that W.. Im not hitting that on anyone thats even remotely mobile lol

Hitting someone with Taliyah's W is the hardest part of her kit imo.
It does depend tho.
If someone is chasing you or you're waiting in a bush for someone, then it's pretty easy. But once someone has boots and enough movementspeed, it's pretty easy to dodge.

It takes good prediction to hit properly, but that can be trained.

Did you play tank fizz or ap fizz?
ap fizz still shits on every immobile midlaner.

Mostly ap mid (probably around 180-200 of those games), but if I got filled top or I felt like playing it I went tank Fizz too.

Idk I need to try him out again but he didnt really feel that fun anymore cause everyone takes {{summoner:21}} and buys a {{item:1057}} at like minute 7 on those immobile champs so I cant actually kill them since I take TP {{item:3070}}

I'm a top/adc main.  When autofilled:

http://i.imgur.com/YYMbABK.png{/img] lul
You should play Morgana more often. Seems to work just fine.

https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=big+lincoln

plat monkeys don't know how to play vs Illaoi so I have a good winrate with her. {{champion:113}} would b freelo but, again, plat monkeys, so somehow they manage to play poorly enough i can't carry xd

season 7 sucks

Didn't see an Illaoi main in a while. Nice KDA
